legend.span: Apakah Ibu termasuk keluarga miskin atau tidak
Does mother belong to poor family or not?

label.span: Nama Posyandu tempat Ibu menerima pelayanan kesehatan
Name of Health Post where mother receives health care
Nama kader Posyandu yang memberi Ibu pelayanan kesehatan
Name of community health worker that gives health service
Nama dukun yang menemani Ibu pada saat menerima pelayanan kesehatan
Name of traditional birth attendant that accompany mother during health care service

span.span: National Health Insurance for the Poor and Near Poor;
